interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Good Morning, Vietnam (Special Edition)
Review Date: 2014/10/31
Store: Robin Williams  (Actor),     Forest Whitaker  (Actor),     Barry Levinson  (Director),     Peter Sova  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Comedy
Product Description: ['When the U.S. Army engages irreverent, nonconformist radio deejay Adrian Cronauer, it unleashes a secret, if unpredictable, weapon: laughter. Academy Award(R) winner Robin Williams (Best Supporting Actor, GOOD WILL HUNTING, 1997) shakes up 1965 Saigon in the role that garnered him his very first Oscar(R) nomination. Imported by the military to host an early a.m. radio show, Cronauer (Williams) blasts the formerly serene, sanitized airwaves with a constant barrage of rapid-fire humor and the hottest hits from back home. The G.I.s love him, but the top brass is up in arms. Riddled with sidesplitting comic salvos, bittersweet bombshells, and hot \'60s rock \'n\' roll, this landmark film chronicles one man\'s raucous Saigon adventures amidst a world gone mad. Featuring all-new bonus material that includes hilarious outtakes from Robin Williams\' "raw" monologues, this Special Edition of GOOD MORNING, VIETNAM, scores a direct hit every time you watch.']
Average Rating: 4.8

['When the U.S. Army engages irreverent, nonconformist radio deejay Adrian Cronauer, it unleashes a secret, if unpredictable, weapon: laughter. Academy Award(R) winner Robin Williams (Best Supporting Actor, GOOD WILL HUNTING, 1997) shakes up 1965 Saigon in the role that garnered him his very first Oscar(R) nomination. Imported by the military to host an early a.m. radio show, Cronauer (Williams) blasts the formerly serene, sanitized airwaves with a constant barrage of rapid-fire humor and the hottest hits from back home. The G.I.s love him, but the top brass is up in arms. Riddled with sidesplitting comic salvos, bittersweet bombshells, and hot \'60s rock \'n\' roll, this landmark film chronicles one man\'s raucous Saigon adventures amidst a world gone mad. Featuring all-new bonus material that includes hilarious outtakes from Robin Williams\' "raw" monologues, this Special Edition of GOOD MORNING, VIETNAM, scores a direct hit every time you watch.']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interests:** Movies, particularly in the comedy genre, with a strong preference for films featuring humor interwoven with historical themes or societal commentary.
- **Favorite Actors:** Displays a notable admiration for Robin Williams, appreciating his unique comedic style and performances, especially in films that offer both laughter and emotional depth.
- **Viewing Format Preference:** Shows a tendency towards purchasing special edition DVDs, indicating a preference for collectors' items or enhanced content.
- **Emotional Engagement:** Values films that resonate with personal experiences, particularly those related to veterans, suggesting an appreciation for narratives that explore complex human experiences and evoke nostalgia.
- **Rating Behavior:** Tends to give high ratings (average rating of 4.8), reflecting a positive and appreciative perspective toward quality cinema. Engages thoughtfully with content, favoring films with meaningful storytelling.
